name: Intake → Analyze → Configure → Validate → Approve
description: End-to-end orchestration from request intake through automated configuration, validation, and human approval

name: Monitor → Detect → Analyze → Recommend → Act
description: Continuous monitoring with intelligent detection, analysis, recommendation generation, and automated action

name: Collect → Validate → Enrich → Resolve → Communicate
description: Issue resolution workflow with data collection, validation, enrichment, automated resolution, and customer communication

name: Analyze → Optimize → Recommend → Approve → Execute
description: Optimization pattern for resource allocation, pricing, and operational decisions

name: Ingest → Normalize → Reconcile → Report
description: Data processing pattern for billing, revenue assurance, and financial operations

name: Assess → Design → Quote → Approve → Provision
description: Service delivery pattern from assessment through design, pricing, approval, and provisioning

name: Monitor → Correlate → Diagnose → Remediate → Verify
description: Network operations pattern for proactive issue detection and automated remediation

name: Extract → Validate → Transform → Load → Analyze
description: Data integration pattern for partner operations, compliance, and reporting
